cop4331.model

Class Bundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • cop4331.model.Bundle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineItem

    public class Bundle
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineItem
    A bundle of line items that is again a line item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bundle()
      Constructs a bundle with no items.
